com.mozilla.secops.parser.eventfiltercfg

Class EventFilterCfg

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mozilla.secops.parser.eventfiltercfg.EventFilterCfg

  • public class EventFilterCfg
extends Object
    Initialize EventFilter objects using a configuration file

    The EventFilterCfg class supports initializing event filters using filter configuration that is specified in a JSON configuration file rather then calling into the filtering API directly. This is useful for supporting more dynamic filter configuration without code changes.
